summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6737 for the improvement of 47th Avenue Southwest from vacated Maplewood Place Southwest to Southwest Roxbury Street, and certain other avenues, a street, and easements, by water mains, etc., levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district, establishing a local improvement fund, and amending Ordinance 110664, Section 3, to revise the boundaries of said district to eliminate therefrom parcels of land which are not specially benefited by the improvement.
